short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attach sticky notes to any page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Single click sticky notes.

* Nice look and feel.
* Synchronizes across your logged-in browsers.
* Easy to use.
* Nothing excessive, only what you need to remember a pair of words.
